reviewText: Road movies have become a sub-genre within the romcom genre, but this is something different as far as the road romance is concerned. Road-romcom, in this instance, is perhaps a misnomer. It's more like a romantic road rage between a divorced couple on the way to their daughter;s wedding in Corfu. Why don't they fly? Well, it's all to do with the eponymous 'Volcano' You'll remember the Icelandic eruption That pumped ash into the atmosphere ground all European flights, well it's that volcano. This movie is a lotta fun.
